body_html:
In MacOSX, 0.11 (final, non-rc) and 0.12 both require CuDNN 5.1 if you are using our prebuilt packages.
in 0.11 rc versions, we noticed a problem in our builder machines where there were discrepancies in mac cudnn versions, so please install cudnn 5.1, then upgrade to either 0.11.0 (final) or 0.12.0rc0.
body_text:
In MacOSX, 0.11 (final, non-rc) and 0.12 both require CuDNN 5.1 if you are using our prebuilt packages.
in 0.11 rc versions, we noticed a problem in our builder machines where there were discrepancies in mac cudnn versions, so please install cudnn 5.1, then upgrade to either 0.11.0 (final) or 0.12.0rc0.
body:
In MacOSX, 0.11 (final, non-rc) and 0.12 both require CuDNN 5.1 if you are using our prebuilt packages.
in 0.11 rc versions, we noticed a problem in our builder machines where there were discrepancies in mac cudnn versions, so please install cudnn 5.1, then upgrade to either 0.11.0 (final) or 0.12.0rc0.
